Title: project_id
Description: the unique identifier for this capital project

Title: project_description
Description: a description of the capital project

Title: managing_agency_id
Description: the id of the agency that manages this capital project

Title: managing_agency
Description: the name of the agency that manages this capital project

Title: ten_year_plan_category
Description: the category assigned to this project in the ten-year capital strategy

Title: community_boards_served
Description: space-delimited list of community district codes that this project serves. (101 = Manhattan Community District 1)

Title: borough
Description: the borough that this capital project serves. One of NYC's five boroughs or 'Citywide'

Title: budget_lines
Description: the capital budget lines that fund this capital project

Title: original_budget
Description: the original budgeted amount for this capital project

Title: city_prior_actuals
Description: prior actual city-funded spending on this capital project

Title: city2021
Description: planned city-funded spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Description: planned city-funded spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Description: planned city-funded spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Description: planned city-funded spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Title: city2025
Description: planned city-funded spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Title: city_total
Description: total planned city-funded spending on this capital project

Title: non_city_prior_actuals
Description: prior actual non-city-funded spending on this capital project

Title: non_city2021
Description: planned non-city-funded spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Title: non_city2025
Description: planned non-city-funded spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Title: non_city_total
Description: total planned non-city-funded spending on this capital project

Title: combined_prior_actuals
Description: prior actual spending on this capital project

Title: combined2021
Description: planned spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Description: planned spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Description: planned spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Description: planned spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Title: combined2025
Description: planned spending on this capital project for a specific fiscal year

Title: combined_total
Description: total planned spending on this capital project

Title: explanation_for_delay
Description: an explanation for the delays observed in a capital project

Title: project_location
Description: additional location details for this captial project

Title: scope_summary
Description: additional scope information for this capital project

Title: source_pdf
Description: the original pdf filename that this row of data was scraped from
